parameters.name: q

schema.title: Words used for fuzzy search
schema.description: An item is returned if any word in this list fuzzy-matches a word in the item's name or description. However, the more given words that do not match any word in the item's name or description, the higher the word matching distance is.

parameters.description: An item is returned if any word in this list fuzzy-matches a word in the item's name or description. However, the more given words that do not match any word in the item's name or description, the higher the word matching distance is.

schema.title: Targeted age months
schema.description: An item is returned if its targeted age months is included in this range. The values are the targeted age in months. A null value specify an infinite bound.
